mapper.select: select c.id as cid, c.nombre as cnombre, c.creditosacademicos as ccreditosacademicos, c.horasaprovadasmonitoria as chorasaprovadasmonitoria, tc.idtemacurso as tcid, tc.tema as tctema, tc.descripcion as tcdescripcion from curso as c, temacurso as tc where tc.curso_id = c.id
select count(a.idasesoria) from asesoria as a, grupo as g where a.grupo_idgrupoasistente = g.idgrupo and g.semestre_numero = #{semestre} and g.curso_id = #{curso}
mapper.insert: insert into curso (id, nombre, creditosacademicos, horasaprovadasmonitoria) values( #{id},#{nombre}, #{creditos}, #{horas})
mapper.select: select distinct c.id as cid, c.nombre as cnombre, c.creditosacademicos as ccreditosacademicos, c.horasaprovadasmonitoria as chorasaprovadasmonitoria from curso as c, grupo as g, monitoria as mo where c.id = g.curso_id and g.idgrupo = mo.grupo_idgrupo and g.semestre_numero = #{semestre}

select c.id as cid, c.nombre as cnombre, c.creditosacademicos as ccreditosacademicos, c.horasaprovadasmonitoria as chorasaprovadasmonitoria from curso as c, grupo as g, monitoria as mo where c.id = g.curso_id and g.idgrupo = mo.grupo_idgrupo and mo.idmonitoria = #{monitoria}
